TEST_NAME: Delete buttons should be correctly styled
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when  aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--simple%'
            then 'N'
						when  aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--danger%'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.button_is_hot = 'Yes'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.display_position_code != 'DELETE'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.database_action != 'SQL DELETE action'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.button_name, 
       aapb.button_template, 
       aapb.button_template_options, 
       aapb.button_is_hot, 
       aapb.display_position_code, 
       aapb.confirm_enabled, 
       aapb.database_action,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is misconfigured (Template options: `%3`, Button is hot: `%4`, Display position code : `%5`, Database action : `%6`)',
            p0 => aapb.button_name, 
            p1 => aapb.page_id,
            p2 => aapb.application_id, 
            p3 => aapb.button_template_options, 
            p4 => aapb.button_is_hot, 
            p5 => aapb.display_position_code, 
            p6 => aapb.database_action
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is misconfigured',
            p0 => aapb.button_name, 
            p1 => aapb.page_id,
            p2 => aapb.application_id
       )  issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
and aapb.button_name = 'DELETE'
